org.opends.server.tools.upgrade

Class UpgradeContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.tools.upgrade.UpgradeContext

  • public final class UpgradeContext
extends Object
    Context information which is passed to upgrade tasks. This might include server configuration, etc.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UpgradeContext(CallbackHandler handler)
      Creates a new upgrade context for upgrading from the instance version (as obtained from config/buildinfo) to the binary version.

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • UpgradeContext

        public UpgradeContext(CallbackHandler handler)
               throws InitializationException
        Creates a new upgrade context for upgrading from the instance version (as obtained from config/buildinfo) to the binary version.
        Parameters:
        handler - The call-back handler for interacting with the upgrade application.
        Throws:
        InitializationException - If an error occurred while reading or parsing the version.

        Returns:
        This upgrade context.
